department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 建立可視覺化低規道衛星星網模擬器
goal.en: Develop a Visualizable Low Earth Orbit Satellite Constellation Simulator

outline.ch:
低規道衛星星網模擬器大綱
1. 低規道衛星星網應用趨勢
2. 基於軌道高度及低規道衛星數量，分析台灣地區衛星通訊可覆蓋範圍
3. 衛星通訊鏈路分析
4. 衛星通訊波束原理及分析
5. 衛星通訊多波束原理及分析
6. 衛星通訊多用戶原理及分析
outline.en:
Outline of Low Earth Orbit Satellite Constellation Simulator
1.Trends in Applications of Low Earth Orbit Satellite Constellations
2.Analysis of Satellite Communication Coverage in Taiwan Based on Orbital Altitude   and Number of Low Earth Orbit Satellites
3.Satellite Communication Link Analysis
4.Principles and Analysis of Satellite Communication Beams
5.Principles and Analysis of Multi-Beam Satellite Communication
6.Principles and Analysis of Multi-User Satellite Communication
